content: Christos Tzamos About | Teaching | Publications Christos Tzamos Contact Associate Professor | University of Athens I am an As­so­ci­ate Pro­fes­sor in the De­part­ment of In­for­mat­ics and Telecom­mu­ni­ca­tions at Uni­ver­sity of Athens and a re­searcher at Archimedes AI. My re­search lies in the in­ter­face of Com­puter Sci­ence with Ma­chine Learn­ing, Sta­tis­tics, Prob­a­bil­ity The­ory and Eco­nom­ics.I was pre­vi­ously an As­sis­tant Pro­fes­sor at Uni­ver­sity of Wis­con­sin-Madi­son and a Post­doc­toral Re­searcher at Mi­crosoft Re­search. I ob­tained my PhD from Mass­a­chu­setts In­sti­tute of Tech­nol­ogy (MIT) and re­ceived my BSc in Elec­tri­cal and Com­puter En­gi­neer­ing from the Na­tional Tech­ni­cal Uni­ver­sity of Athens (NTUA).Re­cent Pub­li­ca­tionsShow Com­plete List of Pub­li­ca­tions.NeurIPS 2024 Active Classification with Few Queries under Misspecification V.
